duties_responsibilities.duty: Empower performance and drive success, motivate teams to be self-organized
Span the full development lifecycle, from requirements identification and prototyping, through design and implementation, to customer acceptance and delivery.
Passionate about working with driving Agile/SCRUM processes to meet and exceed customer expectations
Work in a fast-paced, discovery-oriented environment and creatively exercise problem-solving skills on a continuous basis.
Hands-on experience executing Scrum events/Scrum ceremonies.
Full ownership of the role, providing the framework for teams to get work done in a structured manner, help to set expectations, empower team to collaborate effectively, and ultimately drive results.
